Plot: A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.
Title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Writer: Helen Fielding (novel), Helen Fielding (screenplay), Andrew Davies (screenplay), Richard Curtis (screenplay)
Actors: Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Celia Imrie, James Faulkner
tomatoConsensus: Though there was controversy over the choice of casting, Zellweger's Bridget Jones is a sympathetic, likable, funny character, giving this romantic comedy a lot of charm.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 29 nominations.
